meanings.definition: A written or printed version of material originally presented in another medium.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out transcripts of the speech for the students to read.
meanings.sent2: I requested a copy of the meeting transcripts to review the details.
meanings.sent3: The transcripts of the play were so detailed, they could almost come to life on paper!
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like transcripts, written out for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The transcripts were like a map, guiding us through the information step by step.

meanings.definition: A record of a student's academic performance, including courses taken and grades achieved.
meanings.sent1: The university sent my transcripts to the job recruiter.
meanings.sent2: She needed her high school transcripts to apply for college.
meanings.sent3: The transcripts revealed a story of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent4: His transcripts were a reflection of his commitment to learning.
meanings.sent5: The transcripts were like a mirror, showing her progress throughout the years.
